reviews.review_msg: I adore Dr. Sharren! I've taken three courses with her, and she's honestly the most kind, engaging, and understanding professor I've ever had. She tries to make herself as accessible as possible to students, she gives great feedback, and you can tell she does her best to provide a positive experience for her students. Also, amazing music taste!

I really enjoyed this class with Kandice. Her lectures were usually pretty engaging and she seems much more relatable than other english professors I've had. I particularly enjoyed the playlists of all the songs she played at the start of our synchronous sessions. I'm taking 206 in the spring just to have her again. She is usually pretty clear too.
